job.title: Data Scientist / Computer Vision  ALGORITHM RESEARCHER for our US office
job.description: <p>Vision Elements is looking to hire an experienced&nbsp;Freelance&nbsp;Algorithm Researcher&nbsp;in the fields of computer vision / deep learning.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>American or Canadian candidates are invited to apply and join a professional and experienced group. Be part of fascinating projects and overcome exciting challenges.</p><p>Our projects are diverse, in many sectors, combining teamwork with independent work.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>We are looking for an experienced and independent freelance algorithm researcher to lead our growing activity in the US. Work can take place remotely from the convenience of your home.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Required:</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MSc / PhD / Postdoc in Physics, Mathematics, Electrical Engineering or Computer Sciences</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience in computer vision / data science</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience in as many of the following: </p><p>3D reconstruction algorithm development ; parameter estimation; inverse problems techniques: Graph Theory; Optimization; Deep learning; GPGPU: Medical Imaging</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Thorough skill in MATLAB / Python</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;High proficiency in C++</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Good communication skills (written and verbal)</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Independent and likes challenges</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Employment Type</p><p>Full-time</p><p><br></p><p>Edit job description</p><p><br></p>
